results.title: Simvastatin and disease stabilization in normal tension glaucoma: a cohort study.
results.text_hl: MAIN OUTCOME MEASURES: The primary outcome was the association between @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ use and @<m>DISEASE_Vision_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014786 @@@VF@@@ progression.

citations.NLM: Leung DY, Li FC, Kwong YY, Tham CC, Chi SC, Lam DS. Simvastatin and disease stabilization in normal tension glaucoma: a cohort study. Ophthalmology. 2010 Mar;117(3):471-6. PMID: 20045568

results.title: Visual disturbance due to carotid artery thrombosis in a patient with familial hypercholesterolemia; response to surgical thrombotectomy.
results.text_hl: He subsequently experienced transient @<m>DISEASE_Vision_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014786 @@@right-visual disturbance@@@, and roentogenographic examination was performed.
